resources.string: BiliTerminal2
Lightweight Third-Party Bilibili Client

Note: This software only uses WearBili's legacy interface design and is not affiliated with WearBili in any way.\nAlso: Please refrain from submitting issues about this project to the original project (BiliClient).
This program is fully open-source: the code follows the GNU GPL-V3.0 license,\nand the UI (layout) complies with the CC BY-NC-SA license.

This program utilizes or references portions of code and collected APIs from the following projects: 
WearBili：https://github.com/SpaceXC/WearBili
WristBilibili：https://github.com/luern0313/WristBilibili
BAC Document：https://socialsisteryi.github.io/bilibili-API-collect
WearBili Player：https://github.com/xinxiangshiicheng/xinxiangshicheng_wearbili_player
The program's interface references WearBili's UI components,
designed by @JesseGary_ (authorized usage)

Third-party libraries used in this program:
OkHttp：https://github.com/square/okhttp
Glide：https://github.com/bumptech/glide
PhotoView：https://github.com/Baseflow/PhotoView
Jsoup：https://jsoup.org/
EventBus：https://github.com/greenrobot/EventBus
Gson：https://github.com/google/gson
retrofit：https://github.com/square/retrofit
IjkPlayer：https://github.com/bilibili/ijkplayer
DanmakuFlameMaster：com.github.ctiao:DanmakuFlameMaster
Geetest：com.geetest.sensebot:sensebot
AOSP：https://source.android.google.cn/

Software icon provider: 银狐enlab (original assets from Bilibili)
Additional icons sourced from the web with modifications,
all rights reserved by original creators.

The purpose of this software is to enable low-configuration Android watches
and older mobile phones to access basic Bilibili web features. 

Operating through Bilibili's web interface, this app will neither overload
any APIs nor collect user privacy data. It contains no paid functions,
and its code is fully open-source. If you still believe it infringes your rights,
please reach out (let's talk it out!)

We also disclaim responsibility for property loss (device confiscation)
or mental distress (really?) caused by student users accessing the app
at inappropriate times or locations. Please stay mindful and don't let
it interfere with your studies or daily rhythm! Keep it balanced!
For first-time use, we highly recommend tweaking the interface!\nAdjust the options below and check the preview\nuntil you're fully satisfied with the layout.

The valid range is 0.25~5.00 times. We recommend making small adjustments each time.
After tweaking, preview the page and confirm the display is normal before saving changes.
The new settings will take effect when you open a fresh page.

Note: Avoid pushing values to the extremes—you might regret it!
If reckless adjustments break the app, clear app data or reinstall to fix the chaos!

Minimum: 72. We recommend making minor tweaks each time.
After adjusting, preview the page and confirm the display is normal before saving changes.
Settings will activate when you open a new page.

If reckless adjustments break the app,
clear app data or reinstall to reset the chaos!

Note: This option may have hidden quirks—
modify only if absolutely necessary. Best left untouched!

When this option is activated, the interface margins will adjust to fit round screens,
and the built-in player will switch to a round screen layout.
This reduces the display area, but it's currently the best
and least resource-intensive solution available.

*You can also long-press the "Play" button to quickly access this page.\nIf the redirect fails, ensure you have the corresponding player installed\nand that both the player and BiliTerminal2 are updated to the latest versions.

This is a Fork project of BiliClient.

May you find your own small joys within this little screen!

No discussion group available yet.
To report issues or suggest improvements, please visit the open-source repository to submit an Issue!
Open-source address:https://github.com/huanli233/BiliTerminal2

Please note:
This software is permanently free and open-source and does not collect any of your account or personal information. Use it with peace of mind!
If you paid to download BiliTerminal on any platform, you’ve been scammed!

Click the button below to get started!

Keep in mind: If you encounter mental health-related concerns,
24/7 National Psychological Support Hotline(China only): 010-82951332
Or open the official Bilibili app, go to My Profile → scroll down to Recommended Services → Energy Station.

If you need this, we hope this Easter egg can offer some support.
If someone else might benefit, feel free to share it with them.

This feature allows quick account login using existing credentials.

How to use:
Install BiliTerminal on another device, scan the QR code to log in,
then go to Settings → View Login Info on that device.
Copy the displayed login details into the text box below,
and click Login after verifying the information.

Tip: Save the login details to a .txt file and transfer it via USB from your computer.
If errors occur, check for extra/missing characters in the text.

Important: After completing login on this device,
Clear App Data or Uninstall BiliTerminal on the other device—
DO NOT manually log out via the "Exit Login" option!

Here’s your login info for special access on other devices—
click the button at the bottom to copy it.

This info expires quickly, so use it immediately after retrieval.
Once imported, clear BiliTerminal’s data on this device
(DO NOT manually log out via "Exit Login"!).

Do NOT share this info with others
to prevent account theft!

! This feature will no longer receive updates unless the dev finds time!

Enabling it switches the app to landscape mode,
with some lists displaying three columns—ideal for tablets
or devices that default to horizontal screens.

*Note: Certain pages remain single-column,
and some layouts may be poorly optimized.
TV users should switch to the official TV version
or third-party apps for better compatibility.

Set to 0 to disable the adaptation scheme.
Non-zero values will multiply the scroll distance by this factor.

Tip: Start at 1.0 and tweak up/down
until you hit the sweet spot.
Changes take effect after opening a new page.

Cached videos will be saved to this location.
If the folder doesn't exist, it'll be automatically created.

For previously cached videos, manually move them
to the new folder using a file manager.

No guarantees on whether quirky issues might pop up.

Cached videos will be saved to this location.
If the folder doesn't exist, it'll be automatically created.

For previously cached videos, manually move them
to the new folder using a file manager.

No guarantees on whether quirky issues might pop up.
If background downloads aren't working properly on your device,\nturn on this option to revert to the older foreground downloader.

As the name suggests, this lets you modify the splash screen text—
line breaks are supported.
The text will be interrupted automatically
after the network request completes.

If you hit a snag with API hiccups,
toggle this on—it helps devs
serve up juicier error details.

P.S. They might also flip this switch
while tinkering under the hood.

Due to the dev's questionable coding chops (let's call it... creative),
random errors might flicker in app lists—rare but unavoidable.

Though occasional, they’re irritating enough.
So the dev (now clinging to sanity) trapped the error,
replaced it with a “No need to report this” toast,
and tossed in this debug toggle as a truce flag.

string-array.name: eggs
string-array.item:
Long live Furry enthusiasts—fluffiness reigns supreme!

#Contributor: 红豆（君）爱福瑞
Robin: Though I'm not a Furry fan,
I have to say—they're irresistibly cute!

Don't be afraid of the long way because you have the ability to write a long story.
When facing hurdles or setbacks, don’t feel defeated.
Keep your heart open, stay optimistic, and look forward—
the future holds countless beautiful moments waiting for you.

Sincere apologies! Robin found this in old notes
and can’t remember who originally shared it!!!TAT
If this belongs to you, come claim it!
In your hands, every page chronicles my victories.\n\n#Contributor: MOSS

Let this moonlit radiance illuminate every peak and stream!

#Contributor: Anonymous
#To: 镜流

Don’t regret or blame—your own life.
Don’t deny—the desire for happiness.
Don’t speak—those sorrowful words of abandoning life
or seeking escape from pain.
Don’t believe—you were born to suffer.
That notion—
it’s utterly untrue.

#Contributor: huanli233

Android 3.0 — The world may have forgotten it,
but never abandoned it.

#Contributor: 船魔苏心

May the Mother Goddess thrice close Her eyes upon you,
Let your veins surge eternal,
Your journey stay unshaken,
And schemes stay veiled forever.

#Contributor: 白什盘
"Phonk is the real music!" (personal opinion)\n\n#Contributor: DICK
"I want everyone to know I'm a bottom!\n\n#Contributor: 零星さま"

"Gen above, Dui below, with the Third Yin Line...
Hmm... Bet someone's slacking off on the job!

#Contributor: 符玄"

There will always be mortal beings who dare to confront
the radiant might of thunder.

#Submitter: Anonymous
#To: Kazuha

If we only focus on rushing straight to the destination,
we might squander the opportunities and wonders along the journey.

#Submitter: Stargazing Yoimiya

Five centuries of history flashed by,
and the liberation of the caged bird marks a fresh beginning.

#Submitter: Moxie
#To: Nahida
History is written by the victors.\n\n#Contributor: 曲名真楠

Battle electronic crickets
Become a Cyber Prince
Tease virtual catgirls
Savor the digital life

#Source: Internet
#Contributor: RobinNotBad

Lower expectations to the bare minimum,
and every encounter becomes a gift.

#Source: Internet
#Contributor: RobinNotBad

The seemingly cold 'binary data'
sometimes holds the power to warm hearts.

#Contributed by: RobinNotBad

Vapor meets lips, seven parts transform into snow leopards,
The remaining three roar as frosted gleam—
A breath exhales half of Litang's mystique.

Strolling with stars through dreams, four-leaf clover weaves ballads,
Feet treading blossoms dispel sorrows—
A flick of tiny hands unveils skies of fantasies.

#First half from Bilibili, latter half by Robin（
#Contributed by: RobinNotBad

She is an ephemeral strand of code, I am a disordered mass of organic matter. We're the perfect pair!

She isn't just code—A symphony of monitor, processor, memory, controller;
I'm not merely matter—Dances between nucleic acids, proteins, minerals, carbohydrates;
—I mean, when we pour emotions into lifeless things, life begins to flow.

When I imbue code with every ounce of feeling, she transcends being mere code!

#Source: Internet
#Contributed by: RobinNotBad

May I rest upon starlit rivers in slumber,
May I embrace the lunar glow in shared dreams.

#Source: Interne
 #Contributed by... RobinNotBad & Nahida?

Surely a Nahida enthusiast can sneak in a little easter egg here (since no one's watching anyway
"Hmm? Looks like no more easter eggs here~\n\nFeel free to share yours~"

resources.string: com.aliangmaker.media
com.xinxiangshicheng.wearbiliplayer.cn

Some watches (e.g. MiTu) enable swipe-right-to-go-back by simulating the back button. Enable this switch if accidental swipes exit pages during left/right navigation.

Note: Enabling will disable back-button exits on other devices, and may cause interface freezes after swipe-back gestures.
Use the Exit button at the bottom menu to close the app.
Most users can keep this off.
Enable this option: Adding to favorites exits the page, Canceling favorites keeps you on the page.
Enable this option: Exiting the favorites page will show a success message. \n(Though your selection was saved the moment you picked a folder—This switch exists just for that warm fuzzy feeling（
Enabling this option will display video tags like "原神UP主激励计划/原神/纳西妲/手机游戏" on the video details page.
Enabling this option will switch to the new homepage recommendation API, which closely mirrors the web version. Please test it out yourself and decide whether to enable it based on your experience.
Enabling this option will display related video recommendations on the right side of the comments section in the video details page.
Enabling this option will display the Creator Center on the "My" page (where you can view data trends for your posted videos).
Enabling this option allows long-pressing text (e.g., video descriptions or comments) to bring up a copy interface for text duplication.

Enabling this option changes tapping the cover on the video details page from viewing the image to starting playback. By default, the setting is determined by whether you first tapped the video cover or the play button during initial use.
Enable this option to prevent images from loading during list scrolling—they'll only load after you stop.\nThis may affect visual smoothness but could improve scrolling performance.

Some generic-brand watches and devices with extremely low Android versions lack WEBP format support,
which could lead to unloaded images.
Enabling this option forces JPG format requests to resolve this,
though loading may take slightly longer.
Enabling this option will detect links/BV/AV/CV numbers in text content and automatically convert them into clickable links that can be opened with a tap.

Enabling this option will implement asynchronous loading for specific pages
(displaying a loading animation until content fully renders).

Note: Activating asynchronous loading may occasionally trigger crashes,
while disabling it could make some pages appear frozen during loading,
resulting in suboptimal experience. Please configure according to your needs!
Enabling this option will apply fade-in/fade-out animations\nwhen images and specific pages finish loading.
Enabling this option will enforce stricter matching rules\nwhen identifying links (excluding codes like AV/BV/CV)\nto prevent entire paragraphs from being mistakenly recognized as URLs.

Tip

← Swipe left/right to flip pages meow →

(Total: many many pages. This prompt will hide after your first swipe!)
During video playback, if there's existing viewing history exceeding 5 seconds,\nthe video will automatically resume from the historical position.

The built-in player's bottom-right corner displays the real-time viewer count
for videos, or shows historical viewers and entry alerts during live streams.

If playback crashes midway, you can try toggling off this feature.

This functionality is exclusive to the built-in player.

During video playback, use photo-viewing gestures to zoom and pan,
double-tap the screen to reset size.

For single-touch devices: Double-tap and keep holding on the second press,
then drag vertically to zoom.

! If zooming fails, toggle the [Display Mode] option below! 

Special thanks: Liangwan Player
Optimized for large-screen devices,\nwhile potentially causing usability issues on smartwatches.

! If encountering video playback glitches/crashes/unresponsiveness/zoom failure,
try toggling this option!

Known issues: KidoX3 works only with Surface mode,
Xiaotiancai requires Texture mode,
and some devices need Texture mode for zoom functionality.

Hardware Decoding: GPU-powered processing,
fast speeds with minimal energy consumption

Software Decoding: CPU-driven computation,
broader compatibility & winter hand-warming bonus
Stick with AudioTrack for regular use.\nIf encountering audio delay or playback failure, try switching modes.
All danmaku except Advanced Danmaku are forced to display as scrolling types\nto prevent top and bottom layers from blocking the view.
Display sender names in live chat danmaku during live streams.
Enabling this feature will automatically prompt the subtitle selection dialog\nwhen playing videos with available subtitles.
Enabling this option will make the player display subtitle selection prompts\n even if a video only has Chinese AI subtitles. This might get a bit annoying, so enable with caution.
Enabling this option will hide the exclusive red username\nfor Big Member users in comment sections.
Enabling this option will hide users' fans badges in comment sections.
Enabling this option will display usernames in comment sections as a marquee instead of line breaks.
Enabling this option will make you enter live rooms as a guest identity.\n\nNote: Missed bullet chat situations will become more frequent after enabling.
Blocked by Bilibili's risk control system\n(No solution available)
Here are the known open-source license information for the icons:
Please use the official Bilibili mobile app to scan and log in\nClick the QR code to zoom in or out
Fetching QR code
QR code has expired, click above to refresh
Logging in...
The QR code login API may undergo changes,\nbut you can still try scanning to log in.\nRecommend reporting this to the developers
Scanned, please tap on the mobile client to log in.
First time meeting...
Restore defaults
Round screen adaptation
Interface size
Please enter the multiple
Valid range: 0.25x-5.00x.\nWe recommend making incremental adjustments for optimal results.
Interface margin
Horizontal
Vertical
The first input field controls horizontal margins, the second adjusts vertical margins (Unit: Percentage).\nFor security purposes, values exceeding 30 will not be saved.
View Preview
Confirm Settings
BiliTerminal, Launch!
Restoration completed.
Informations for open source icons.
About
Version Name
Version Number
The current version is a beta release\nand does not reflect the final official version.
RobinNotBad
and his Nahida (Project Initiator | Shit Code Pioneer)
